attributes.long_name: AGC code for Ku band in SAR mode
distance antenna-CoG correction in Ku SAR mode
attributes.comment: distance in the z-component between the centre of mass of the satellite and the altimeter antenna reference point

attributes.long_name: I2+Q2 measurement for Ku band in SAR mode
attributes.comment: the echo is the so-called Ku-band averaged echo, corrected for the GPRW effect

attributes.long_name: fully calibrated Ku-band echoes, i measurements aligned within the stack in Ku SAR mode
attributes.comment: i values (256*128 samples) in the frequency domain, aligned within the stack, the useful echoes of the table are the first nb_stack_l1bs_echo_sar_ku echoes. The echoes must be scaled with iq_scale_factor_l1bs_echo_sar_ku. The echoes are not scaled using the corrected AGC.

attributes.long_name: internal path correction for Ku band in SAR mode
attributes.comment: value the closest in time from the burst time tag

attributes.long_name: number of waveforms summed in stack for Ku SAR mode
fully calibrated Ku-band echoes, q measurements aligned within the stack in Ku SAR mode
attributes.comment: q values (256*128 samples) in the frequency domain, aligned within the stack, the useful echoes of the table are the first nb_stack_l1bs_echo_sar_ku echoes. The echoes must be scaled with iq_scale_factor_l1bs_echo_sar_ku. The echoes are not scaled using the corrected AGC.

attributes.long_name: corrected range for Ku band in SAR mode
attributes.comment: distance between the altimeter reference point and the surface height associated to a range gate used as reference inside the tracking window (reference tracking point), corrected for USO frequency drift and internal path correction

attributes.comment: scaling factor corrected for AGC instrumental errors and internal calibration
